input.sentences: the council gathered in the room .
later | the reports got their words in .
output.sentences: Three men are having a debate.
The cameras and the eyes of the audience are on them as they discuss difficult issues.
One of the men is passionate and really wants to get his point accross.
The other man next to him is not impressed with what he has to say at all.
When the debate is concluded, the men hold interviews about what they discussed outside the building.
